code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CardDetails=()=>{let{id}=useParams();let[fetchedData,updateFetchData]=useState([]);let{name,image,location,origin,gender,species,status,type}=fetchedData;let api="https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/".concat(id);useEffect(info=>{(async function(){let data=await fetch(api).then(res=>res.json());updateFetchData(data);})();},[api]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container d-flex justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"img-fluid"}),(()=>{if(status==="Dead"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"badge bg-danger fs-5",children:status});}else if(status==="Alive"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"badge bg-success fs-5",children:status});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"badge bg-secondary fs-5",children:status});}})(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:"Gender :"})," ",gender]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:"Species :"})," ",species]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:"Type : "})," ",type===""?"Unkown":type]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:"Location : "})," ",location===null||location===void 0?void 0:location.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bold",children:"Origin : "})," ",origin===null||origin===void 0?void 0:origin.name]})]})]})});};export default CardDetails;
